about_the_game:
Mighty Monster Mayhem Demo is a Beta release and may not reflect the final quality of the game.


Have you ever dreamed of creating total mayhem? Perhaps your goal in life is to destroy cities. Maybe, just maybe, you thought becoming a giant monster of incredible strength pounding through a city, feasts on people and creating havoc is what motivates you. Then welcome to MIGHTY MONSTER MAYHEM DEMO!

The Mighty Monster Mayhem Demo gives you the chance to play as the massive Cthulu! Rampage through the city, destroying buildings and wreaking havoc!


This is your chance to travel, see new cities (and destroy them), meet new people (and eat them), make new friends (and smash them)! So much mighty fun!
  • Smash buildings to the ground
  • Eat civilians AND military!
  • Climb the buildings!
  • Throw vehicles!
  • Destroy entire cities!
  • Leap to incredible heights!

Coming Soon - Mid-April!

short_description: Mighty Monster Mayhem is the VR Demo that gives you the power to be a monster. Crash through cities, destroying buildings, and eating people. Climb the highest buildings, leap incredible distances. Take on the ever vigilant military bent on stopping your mission of TOTAL DESTRUCTION!
